changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.product_parent_sequencing_authorization AS SELECT base_table.id, p.name AS service, sc.name AS status_code, base_table.sequence_number, mp.name AS parent, mps.name AS parent_status_to_set, base_table.set_if_active_siblings, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.update_date FROM ruleform.product_parent_sequencing_authorization base_table JOIN ruleform.product p ON base_table.service = p.id JOIN ruleform.status_code sc ON base_table.status_code = sc.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product mp ON base_table.parent = mp.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.status_code mps ON base_table.parent_status_to_set = mps.id JOIN ruleform.agency up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.product_parent_sequencing_authorization OWNER TO core; GRANT ALL ON TABLE readable.product_parent_sequencing_authorization TO core; GRANT SELECT ON TABLE readable.product_parent_sequencing_authorization TO core_read_write; GRANT SELECT ON TABLE readable.product_parent_sequencing_authorization TO core_read_only;
